file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 05-20-41-06 - PRESSURE BULKHEAD AND BAGGAGE COMPARTMENT LH/RH SIDES - INTERNAL - INSPECTION/CHECK

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL PRESSURE BULKHEAD AND BAGGAGE COMPARTMENT LH/RH SIDES - INTERNAL - INSPECTION/ CHECK EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to do the visual inspection of the pressure bulkhead, pressurized area side, for general condition. B. Related Zones: 275/276. C. (Applicable to EMB-145 ( ) models) Zone Boundaries: STA X = 25581.0. (Applicable to EMB-135 ( ) models) Zone Boundaries: STA X = 22041.0. D. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY PRESSURE BULKHEAD - PRESSURIZED ALL 05-20-41-200-801-A ♦ AREA SIDE - INTERNAL GENERAL VISU- AL INSPECTION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 05-20-41 Page 1 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 05-20-41-200-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. PRESSURE BULKHEAD - PRESSURIZED AREA SIDE - INTERNAL GENERAL VISUAL INSPECTION A. General (1) This procedure obeys the EWIS ICA requirement. (2) This task gives instructions to do SMRD Zonal Task 53-Z275-214-001-A00. (3) You must do the internal general visual inspection (GVI) of rear fuselage I, at zones 275/276, within a touching distance of the items examined. (4) The function of the internal general visual inspection (GVI) is to find damage, failure, or irregular conditions that can be easily seen. (5) Apart from any specific targets defined in the Zonal Inspection task, a General Visual Inspection (GVI) must be conducted of the entire zone specified and includes all installations, components and structures. Refer to AMM Introduction for zonal inspection criteria. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - WM 20-22-00 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 272 272DR Rear Fuselage, RH side D. Tools and Equipment ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Standard Ladder To get access to the inspection area E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Rear fuselage I - pressure bulkhead EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 05-20-41 Page 2 of 4 Rev 50 - Apr 29/16 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Put the ladder in position. (2) Open the access door 272DR (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100). J. Internal General Visual Inspection (Figure 601) SUBTASK 212-002-A (1) Examine the interior of the zone for loose rivets, nicks, cracks, dents, erosion, corrosion, and deteriorated protective treatment at the rear pressure bulkhead (Figure 601). (2) Examine the EWIS components for signs of damage, adequate installation, chafing and general condition. Refer to WM 20-22-00. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Close the access door 272DR (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100). (2) Remove the ladder.
